thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Southeastern Grocers Says Plan Of Reorganization Confirmed By Court

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Southeastern Grocers Says Plan Of Reorganization Confirmed By Court
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Southeastern Grocers:
* SOUTHEASTERN GROCERS PLAN OF REORGANIZATION CONFIRMED BY COURT
* SOUTHEASTERN GROCERS LLC SAYS U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT FOR DISTRICT OF DELAWARE HAS CONFIRMED COMPANY’S AMENDED PREPACKAGED CHAPTER 11 PLAN
* SOUTHEASTERN GROCERS - EXPECTS TO COMPLETE FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING PROCESS, EMERGE FROM CHAPTER 11 IN COMING WEEKS
* SOUTHEASTERN GROCERS - WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE MORE THAN 575 STORES UNDER BI-LO, FRESCO Y MÁS, HARVEYS SUPERMARKET & WINN-DIXIE BANNERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: [ ]
